name: Professor Meteor and the Perplexical Floor
name_original: Professor Meteor and the Perplexical Floor
description:
Use arrow keys to move. Use R key to restart. Use ESC key to return to main menu. Use face to smile in joy at the incredible game.

Goal is to absorb all of the weather into your analyser for analysis, then you complete the level.

Level editor included, please post any levels you make for other people to play :).

If I steal anyone's levels, I'll need to include a credits system, that says who made the level.
